Replace.Text: 新城市获得1个免费的建造者。[NEWLINE]所有城市受到的爆铺惩罚减少一个等级。[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]所有城市可建造的专业化区域数量-1（需要至少5个人口才能建造第一个专业化区域）。[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]奖励1个 [Icon_Governor] 总督头衔。

New cities receive a free Builder. [NEWLINE]Reduce one level of crazy-expansion penalty for all cities.[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]-1 specialty district slot for all cities (requires at least 5 citizens to build the first specialty district.).[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Awards +1 [Icon_Governor] Governor Title.
占领的城市+8忠诚度。[NEWLINE]占领一座敌方城市后，所有城市将获得+10%的所有类型产出加成，效果持续10回合，效果可叠加。[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]城市边境扩张的速度-20%。[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]奖励1个 [Icon_Governor] 总督头衔。

+8 loyalty for all captured cities. [NEWLINE]Capturing an enemy City grants 10% bonus for all types of yields in all Cities for 10 turns. This bonus is stackable. [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]-20% city border expansion speed.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Awards +1 [Icon_Governor] Governor Title.
有 [ICON_Governor] 总督就职的城市+2 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度并+2所有类型产出，[ICON_Governor] 总督的每次升级+5%所有非食物产出。[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]没 [ICON_Governor] 总督就职的城市-5忠诚度。[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]奖励1个 [Icon_Governor] 总督头衔。

+2 [ICON_Amenities] amenities and +2 for all types of yields in cities with a [ICON_Governor] governor, each [ICON_Governor] Governors upgrate provide +5% bonus for all non-food yields. [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]-5 loyalty in cities without a [ICON_Governor] governor.[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]Awards +1 [Icon_Governor] Governor Title.
间谍与间谍容量+1。[NEWLINE]我方间谍行动的成功率上升1个等级,敌方间谍在我方领土行动的成功率降低1个等级。[NEWLINE]您的间谍可以选择任何可用升级。[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]每回合获得的同盟点数减少0.25。[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]奖励1个 [Icon_Governor] 总督头衔。

+1 Spy and Spy capacity.[NEWLINE]Enemy Spy level reduced by 1 in your lands. Your Spy level is increased by 1 for offensive operations.[NEWLINE]Your Spy units can choose from any possible promotion.[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]-0.25 alliance points per turn.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Awards +1 [Icon_Governor] Governor Title.
获得用 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买陆地战斗单位和平民单位的能力。[NEWLINE]此城释放的宗教压力加倍。[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]若玩家没有创立宗教或城市没有宗教信仰，则该城市购买陆地战斗单位和平民单位的价格+20%。[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]奖励1个 [Icon_Governor] 总督头衔。

Grants the ability to buy land combat units and civilian units with [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE]Double religious pressure released from this city.[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]The cost of purchasing land units is increased by +20% in city without a religion or if player has no founded religion.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Awards +1 [Icon_Governor] Governor Title.
所有单位消灭敌方单位均可恢复生命值（上限20点）。[NEWLINE]军团和军队，舰队和无敌舰队的训练速度加快25%。[NEWLINE]奖励1个 [Icon_Governor] 总督头衔。

All units heal up to 20 hit points when they eliminate a unit.[NEWLINE]Corps and Army training costs reduced 25%. Fleet and Armada training costs reduced 25%.[NEWLINE]Awards +1 [Icon_Governor] Governor Title.
提供任意6个巨作槽位。[NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。[NEWLINE]奖励1个 [Icon_Governor] 总督头衔。
Provides 6 slots for any Great Work.[NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_TOURISM] TOURISM.[NEWLINE]Awards +1 [Icon_Governor] Governor Title.

每回合获得5点影响力点数和5点 [ICON_FAVOR] 外交支持。[NEWLINE]征召城邦单位消耗的 [ICON_Gold] 金币减半。[NEWLINE]如您是城邦的宗主国，则城邦单位+5 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力（征召单位包含在内）。[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]每拥有一座占领的城市，每回合-1 [ICON_FAVOR] 外交支持。[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]奖励1个 [Icon_Governor] 总督头衔。

Provide +5 Influence points and +5 [ICON_FAVOR] Favor per turn.[NEWLINE]Leveraging City States costs half [ICON_Gold] Gold.[NEWLINE]City State units gain +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength if you are the City State's Suzerain (including Leveraged Units).[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]-1 [ICON_FAVOR] favor for each captured city you own.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Awards +1 [Icon_Governor] Governor Title.
磨坊
Mill
[ICON_RESOURCE_RICE] 大米， [ICON_RESOURCE_WHEAT] 小麦资源分别+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。
[ICON_RESOURCE_RICE] Rice, [ICON_RESOURCE_WHEAT] Wheat resources gain +1 [ICON_Food] Food each.
[ICON_RESOURCE_RICE] 大米， [ICON_RESOURCE_WHEAT] 小麦和 [ICON_RESOURCE_MAIZE] 玉米资源分别+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。
[ICON_RESOURCE_RICE] Rice, [ICON_RESOURCE_WHEAT] Wheat, and [ICON_RESOURCE_MAIZE] Maize resources gain +1 [ICON_Food] Food each.
为所有食物类加成资源+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。只能在城市中建造一个，即使城市拥有多个社区也同样如此。
+1 [ICON_Food] Food for all types of Bonus Resources. Can only be built once in a city, even if the city has multiple Neighborhoods.
城市人口增长速度提高30%。
City growth rate increase 30%.
+10 [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩。只能在城市中建造一个，即使城市拥有多个社区也同样如此。
+10 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism. Can only be built once in a city, even if the city has multiple Neighborhoods.
该城市中训练的所有陆地单位+25%战斗经验值。[NEWLINE]战略资源储备+20（标准速度下）。
此城中训练的所有陆地单位+25%战斗经验值。[NEWLINE]战略资源储备+30（标准速度下）。[NEWLINE]可直接训练军团和军队。军团和军队的训练费用降低25%。
+25% combat experience for all land units trained in this city.[NEWLINE]Strategic Resource Stockpiles increased +20 (on Standard Speed).

+25% combat experience for all land units trained in this city.[NEWLINE]Strategic Resource Stockpiles increased +30 (on Standard Speed).[NEWLINE]Allows Corps and Armies to be trained directly. Corps and Army training costs reduced 25%.
[ICON_RESOURCE_SHEEP] 绵羊， [ICON_RESOURCE_CATTLE] 牛群和 [ICON_RESOURCE_DEER] 鹿资源分别+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。
[ICON_RESOURCE_SHEEP] SHEEP, [ICON_RESOURCE_CATTLE] CATTLE and [ICON_RESOURCE_DEER] DEER resources gain +1 [ICON_Food] Food each.
可再生水源向城市提供+6 [ICON_Power] 电力，向6格范围内的其它城市提供+3 [ICON_Power] 电力。
Provides the city +6 [ICON_Power] Power from renewable water sources, also +3 [ICON_Power] Power for other cities within 6 tiles.
当前城市训练的所有海军单位+25%战斗经验值。此城所有海岸单元格+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力，解锁电力科技后海洋单元格也+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。

+25% combat experience for all naval units trained in this city. +1 [ICON_Production] Production on all Coast tiles for this city, +1 [ICON_Production] Production for Ocean tiles after Electricity technology.
此城中生产的所有海军单位+25%战斗经验值。可直接生产舰队和无敌舰队。舰队和无敌舰队的生产费用降低25%。此城所有海岸单元格和海洋单元格+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币。

+25% combat experience for all naval units trained in this city. Allows Fleets and Armadas to be trained directly. Fleet and Armada training costs reduced 25%. +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold on all Coast tiles and Ocean tiles for this city.
此城中生产的所有海军单位+25%战斗经验值。此城所有海岸单元格+1 [ICON_Food] 食物，解锁电力科技后海洋单元格也+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。若此城市没有市场，则+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。

+25% combat experience for all naval units trained in this city. +1 [ICON_Food] Food on all Coast tiles for this city, +1 [ICON_Food] Food for Ocean tiles after Electricity technology. +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] TradeRoute if there is no Market in this city.
+3 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_Amenities] 宜居度加成延伸到3个单元格中的每个市中心(此加成1座城市仅能应用1次，可与水上乐园建筑叠加)。
+3 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Bonus [ICON_Amenities] Amenity extends to each city center within 3 tiles. This bonus applies once to a city but can stack with Water Park buildings.
+6 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_Amenities] 宜居度加成延伸到4个单元格中的每个市中心(此加成1座城市仅能应用1次，可与水上乐园建筑叠加)。
+6 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Bonus [ICON_Amenities] Amenity extends to each city center within 4 tiles. This bonus applies once to a city but can stack with Water Park buildings.
+9 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_Amenities] 宜居度加成延伸到5个单元格中的每个市中心(此加成1座城市仅能应用1次，可与水上乐园建筑叠加)。
+9 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Bonus [ICON_Amenities] Amenity extends to each city center within 5 tiles. This bonus applies once to a city but can stack with Water Park buildings.
+3 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_Amenities] 宜居度加成延伸到3个单元格中的每个市中心(此加成1座城市仅能应用1次，可与娱乐中心建筑叠加)。

+3 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Bonus [ICON_Amenities] Amenity extends to each city center within 3 tiles. This bonus applies once to a city but can stack with Entertainment Complex buildings.
+6 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_Amenities] 宜居度加成延伸到4个单元格中的每个市中心(此加成1座城市仅能应用1次，可与娱乐中心建筑叠加)。

+6 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Bonus [ICON_Amenities] Amenity extends to each city center within 4 tiles. This bonus applies once to a city but can stack with Entertainment Complex buildings.
+9 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_Amenities] 宜居度加成延伸到5个单元格中的每个市中心(此加成1座城市仅能应用1次，可与娱乐中心建筑叠加)。

+9 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Bonus [ICON_Amenities] Amenity extends to each city center within 5 tiles. This bonus applies once to a city but can stack with Entertainment Complex buildings.
其基础产出延伸到3个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。
Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 3 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Theater Tier 1 building.
可存放 [ICON_GreatWork_Landscape] 艺术巨作。如果在剧院广场区域已经有一座考古博物馆则无法修建。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到4个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Holds [ICON_GreatWork_Landscape] Great Works of Art. May not be built in a Theater Square district that already has an Archaeological Museum. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Theater Tier 2 building.
可存放 [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] 文物。如果在剧院广场区域已经有一座艺术博物馆则无法修建。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到4个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Holds [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifacts. May not be built in a Theater Square district that already has an Art Museum. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Theater Tier 2 building.
其基础产出延伸到5个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。
Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Theater Tier 3 building.
如此城尚未建有灯塔，则+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到3个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity, if this city does not yet have a Lighthouse building.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 3 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Commercial Hub Tier 1 building.
如此城有至少24人口，则+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到4个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] if city has no less than 24 [ICON_Citizen] citizens.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Commercial Hub Tier 2 building.
如此城有至少36人口，则+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到5个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] if city has no less than 36 [ICON_Citizen] citizens.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Commercial Hub Tier 3 building.
其基础产出延伸到3个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。
Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 3 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Industrial Zone Tier 1 building.
其基础产出延伸到4个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。
Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Factory building.

将任意数额的 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] 煤自动转换为 [ICON_Power] 电力，每回合可为周围5个单元格内的城市提供其所需电力：[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1点 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] 煤 [ICON_PowerRight] 6点 [ICON_Power] 电力[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]会向大气层排放大量二氧化碳[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到5个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的“发电厂”建筑获得加成）。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]环境保护模式下，由于环境污染，本城市的所有单元格-1魅力。[ENDCOLOR]

Automatically converts any amount of [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal into [ICON_Power] Power for cities within 5 tiles that need it each turn, at the rate of:[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal [ICON_PowerRight] 6 [ICON_Power] Power[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Heavy CO2 into the atmosphere.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Power Plant building.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]Under Environmental Conservation mode, -1 appeal for all tiles in this city due to environmental pollution.[ENDCOLOR]

将任意数额的 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] 石油自动转换为 [ICON_Power] 电力，每回合可为周围5个单元格内的城市提供其所需电力：[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1点 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] 石油 [ICON_PowerRight] 9点 [ICON_Power] 电力[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]会向大气层排放中量二氧化碳[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到5个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的“发电厂”建筑获得加成）。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]环境保护模式下，由于环境污染，本城市的所有单元格-1魅力。[ENDCOLOR]

Automatically converts any amount of [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil into [ICON_Power] Power for cities within 5 tiles that need it each turn, at the rate of:[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil [ICON_PowerRight] 9 [ICON_Power] Power[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Moderate CO2 into the atmosphere[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Power Plant building.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]Under Environmental Conservation mode, -1 appeal for all tiles in this city due to environmental pollution.[ENDCOLOR]

将任意数额的 [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] 铀自动转换为 [ICON_Power] 电力，每回合可为周围5个单元格内的城市提供其所需电力：[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1点 [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] 铀 [ICON_PowerRight] 12点 [ICON_Power] 电力[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]会向大气层排放少量二氧化碳[NEWLINE]建成后发生核事故的概率会随着核电站老化而增加。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到5个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的“发电厂”建筑获得加成）。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_CULTURE]环境保护模式下，不会造成环境污染。[ENDCOLOR]

Automatically converts any amount of [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] Uranium into [ICON_Power] Power for cities within 5 tiles that need it each turn, at the rate of:[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1 [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] Uranium [ICON_PowerRight] 12 [ICON_Power] Power[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Miniscule CO2 into the atmosphere[NEWLINE]Once built, as a Nuclear Power Plant ages, there is an increased chance for a Nuclear Accident to occur. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Power Plant building.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_CULTURE]Under Environmental Conservation mode, this building will not cause environmental pollution.[ENDCOLOR]
其基础产出延伸到3个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。
Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 3 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 1 building.
其基础产出延伸到4个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。
Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 2 building.
其基础产出延伸到5个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。
Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 3 building.
在此城中获得或召回的英雄单位拥有10%的额外 [ICON_Lifespan] 寿命。允许购买传教士。传教士只能通过 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到3个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Hero units claimed or recalled in this City have 10% longer [ICON_Lifespan] Lifespans.[NEWLINE]Allows the purchasing of Missionaries. Missionaries can only be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 3 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Holy Site Tier 1 building.
在此城中获得或召回的英雄单位拥有10%的额外 [ICON_Lifespan] 寿命。允许购买传教士。传教士只能通过 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到4个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Hero units claimed or recalled in this City have 10% longer [ICON_Lifespan] Lifespans.[NEWLINE]Allows the purchasing of Missionaries. Missionaries can only be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Holy Site Tier 2 building.
在此城中召回英雄所花费的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值降低15%。[NEWLINE]允许购买使徒、上师、审判官，拥有特定信仰还可购买武僧。这些宗教单位只能通过 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到4个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Recalling Heroes in this city costs 15% less [ICON_Faith] Faith. [NEWLINE]Allows the purchasing of Apostles, Gurus, Inquisitors, and with the proper belief, Warrior Monks. These units can only be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Holy Site Tier 2 building.
每回合影响力点数+2。为所有其他文明提供高于一个等级的外交能见度。[NEWLINE]奖励3个 [ICON_ENVOY]使者。可额外招募一名间谍。
+2 Influence Points per turn. Provides one more level of diplomatic visibility on all other civilizations. [NEWLINE]Awards +3 [ICON_ENVOY] Envoy. Grants the ability to construct an additional Spy.
每回合影响力点数+3。此文明俘获或杀死一名敌方间谍时，此间谍每拥有一级升级，文明便获得200点 [ICON_Science] 科技值和200点 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。[NEWLINE]奖励3个 [ICON_ENVOY]使者。可额外招募一名间谍。

+3 Influence Points per turn. When this civilization captures or kills an enemy Spy, receive 200 [ICON_Science] Science and 200 [ICON_Culture] Culture for every level of the enemy Spy.[NEWLINE]Awards +3 [ICON_ENVOY] Envoy. Grants the ability to construct an additional Spy.
